Generate Comprehensive Analysis Report

generate_analysis_report.Rd

Create an interactive HTML report with all analysis results, plots, and code.

Usage

generate_analysis_report(
  analysis_results,
  output_file = "calcium_analysis_report.html",
  report_title = "Calcium Imaging Analysis Report",
  include_code = TRUE,
  include_plots = TRUE,
  include_qc = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

analysis_results

List containing all analysis results

output_file

Path for output HTML file (default: "calcium_analysis_report.html")

report_title

Title for the report (default: "Calcium Imaging Analysis Report")

include_code

Whether to include R code in the report (default: TRUE)

include_plots

Whether to include interactive plots (default: TRUE)

include_qc

Whether to include quality control metrics (default: TRUE)

...

Additional arguments

Value

Path to generated report
